org.davidmoten.rxjava3.jdbc

Interface ConnectionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingletonConnectionProvider

    public interface ConnectionProvider
    Provides JDBC Connections as required. It is advisable generally to use a Connection pool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection provider and releases its resources.
      static ConnectionProvider from(Connection connection)
      Warning: Don't pass one of these as a ConnectionProvider to a pool because once the pool closes the connection the pool cannot create a new one (the same closed connection is returned).
      static ConnectionProvider from(String url) 
      static ConnectionProvider from(String url, Properties properties) 
      static ConnectionProvider from(String url, String username, String password) 
      Connection get()
      Returns a new Connection (perhaps from a Connection pool).

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nonnull
Connection get()
        Returns a new Connection (perhaps from a Connection pool).
        Returns:
        a new Connection to a database

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection provider and releases its resources. For example, a connection pool may need formal closure to release its connections because connection.close() is actually just releasing a connection back to the pool for reuse. This method should be idempotent.

      • from

        static ConnectionProvider from(@Nonnull
                               Connection connection)
        Warning: Don't pass one of these as a ConnectionProvider to a pool because once the pool closes the connection the pool cannot create a new one (the same closed connection is returned). Instead use a different ConnectionProvider factory method.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection for singleton provider
        Returns:
        singleton connection provider (don't use with connection pools!)

      • from

        static ConnectionProvider from(@Nonnull
                               String url)

      • from

        static ConnectionProvider from(@Nonnull
                               String url,
                               String username,
                               String password)

      • from

        static ConnectionProvider from(@Nonnull
                               String url,
                               Properties properties)
